display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (REM): (Apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with no oxygen desaturation used and with or without arousal) / hours of REM sleep from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in rapid eye movement sleep (REM)) / (hours of rapid eye movement sleep (REM))]
calculation: 60*(hrembp + hrop + carbp + carop + oarbp +oarop + marbp + marop) / minremp
